Sacramento.7th & Capitol and 8th & Capitol:
7th & Capitol (southbound) and 8th & Capitol (northbound) is a split light rail station on the Sacramento Regional Transit District's Blue and Gold Lines. It is located in Downtown Sacramento at the intersection of Capitol Mall and 7th Street (south platform) and 8th Street (north platform) and within walking distance of the California State Capitol, Tower Bridge, and Golden 1 Center.
This is a primary light rail station for the Golden 1 Center, home of the NBA's Sacramento Kings and other events.
